word:
What Sister White Wrote in Her Diary. From the Diary of 1859. 

     Sabbath, Jan. 1, 1859. The commencement of another year. My husband went down into the water and buried seven with Christ in baptism; two of them were but children. One prayed earnestly in the water to be kept unspotted from the world. May they live a new life unto God.--Ms 2, 1859
